title: wtf is wrong with players in ranked

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body: this guy first picks vayne and goes adc, like do you seriosuly want to lose that badly? he is silver 2 and averages 98 cs per game on all ADCs  and has an average of around 7-8 deaths as ADC

replies.body: Imagine for a sec tho if you were put in a ranked game with a Kayle named 'Justify' who gives up on the game in the first few minute and is so aggressively toxic for the remainder of the game that Skarner decides to dedicate portions of his fairly average life to just typing this here comment.  Like idk, I'm mainly just disappointed and surprised that you have it in you to actually try to be such a letdown of a person, like that takes an effort and if that's what you put your feelings into I guess you're probably worse off than me and I'm the one writing this shitty comment.
Counters don't matter, skill does, and i this case, supports too.
No matter who you first pick theirs a high chance you'll be countered. Theirs only a few ADC's that counter Vayne, and her late game is insane.
